channel.title: Rust on 玄冬Wong
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on 玄冬Wong

item.title: [Dlang]D与Rust的优缺点比较
item.description: 原文：https://users.rust-lang.org/t/rust-vs-dlang-i-want-more-experienced/4472/19 First things first: You did ask this in a Rust community, so I might be biased, but I will try to be as fair as I can. This of course are my personal opinions, people have different preferences so it is hard to say black-and-white that this is good and this is bad. Take it as “this might be true, I will take this into consideration and research these points and then build on that”.
